subject: Good day,
body:
Good day,
I am Ambassador Dennis Francis, President of the United Nation General
Assembly (UN). I work hand to hand with the Federal Treasury
Department, International Monetary Fund and the World Bank. Further
details about me can be found on the official United Nations website
or via the link below;  https: // press.un.org/en/2023/ga12504.doc.htm
We found that you have an unclaimed compensation payment that was
suppose to be remitted to you has just showed up at my office, maybe
due to some unforeseen circumstance that allow you to finish your
transactions home or abroad, so I took it upon myself to get in touch
with you, before it will be forfeited as you still have the chance to
claim your payment.
Currently, states, federal agencies and other organizations
collectively hold more than $198 billion in unclaimed cash and
benefits, which come from a variety of sources, including abandoned
bank accounts and stock holdings, unclaimed life insurance payouts and
forgotten pension benefits seizures of third party benefit, legal
financial transactions, like lotto winnings, Inheritance claims that
was abandon by individuals over skepticism etc. 
It was however
ascertain that you were supposed to receive a sum of $950,000,00
beneficiary, kindly email this office for claims.
And get back to me for more information on how to claim your funds
before its marked unclaimed.
Yours sincerely,
Ambassador Dennis Francis (UN)
Email address 
unnationsorg@outlook.com

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Good day Ambassador Dennis Francis,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the unclaimed payment. I appreciate your efforts in contacting me before it is forfeited. I would like to know more about the details of this payment and how I can claim it.

Could you please provide me with more information about the source of this payment? How was it determined that I am entitled to receive this sum? Additionally, what steps do I need to take in order to claim the funds?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ramon

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Hello there! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Ramon
